name: musicPlayce
tag_list: music, music-discovery, social, social-media, mobile, iphone, app, geo, location-based, geo-tag, facebook, twitter, foursquare
overview:
musicPlayce is a free mobile app that is all about discovering new Music, Places and Friends in your city and across the globe based on the music you like.

What does musicPlayce do?
